name: Ball Goes Roll
description:
Roll the ball to the end of the level....... that's it really :(

There are three stars up for grabs in each of the four level. Earn stars by collecting coins, completing the level with the fewest resets and finishing the level quickly.

The game is a bit on the difficult size and takes a between 15 and 30 minutes to complete.

Controls

PS4 Controller

The Xbox controller controls are slightly different. I don't have one so I dont know what they are.......Good Luck ;)

Mouse & Keyboard

MouseLook / Select
W,A,S,DMove
RResetFInteractC
Skip Checkpoint
ShiftEnter Leap Mode, Leap (Release)
XExit Leap Mode / Close Tip
QDecrease Leap Height
EIncrease Leap Height
EscapePause Menu

Credits

Music: https://stuartrynn.bandcamp.com/album/doom-ancient-aliens-ost

If you like the game please consider donating.
